Gz7MFL5l.title: Analysis of effects of different modes of irrigation and mulching on water-saving and drought-resistance in sloping orchards of dry-hot valley
Gz7MFL5l.abstract: In jujube orchards of the slope area in the dry-hot valley of Jinsha River,six modes of irrigation and mulching were set in the experiment,namely flood irrigation in bare land(CK),furrow irrigation with straw buried in straight ditches,furrow irrigation with straw buried in mesh ditches,flood irrigation with plants covering,flood irrigation with soil surface straw mulching,and furrow irrigation with straw buried in straight ditch + soil surface straw mulching.The results show that,for soil conservation and water storage capacity,flood irrigation with soil surface straw mulching is better than furrow irrigation with straw buried in straight ditches,and much better than CK.As for rrigation water use efficiency and economic benefit,furrow irrigation with straw buried in straight ditches and furrow irrigation with straw buried in mesh ditches>flood irrigation with straw or plants covering>flood irrigation in bare land.The frequency of furrow irrigation with straw buried in straight ditch + soil surface straw mulching is the lowest,less than 28.6% of that of ck,while its water use efficiency is 6.7 times of the ck.The order of water-saving efficiency is furrow irrigation with straw buried in straight ditch + soil surface straw mulchingfurrow irrigation with straw buried in mesh ditches≥flood irrigation with soil surface straw mulching>furrow irrigation with straw buried in straight ditches≥flood irrigation with plants coveringCK.Furrow irrigation with straw buried in straight ditch + soil surface straw mulching has the best economic benefit,then followed by furrow irrigation with straw buried in mesh ditches,and they are 2.36 and 2.16 times of that of ck,while their output/input ratio are 1.9 and 1.8 times of that of ck.All these indicate that furrow irrigation with straw buried in straight ditch plus soil surface straw mulching can make irrigation water fully infiltrate into soil,reduce surface runoff and evaporation,improve soil water storage capacity,so as to improve irrigation water use efficiency and orchard economic benefits.

lQoYULHX.title: Study on Light,Heat and Water Utilization Efficiency of Cropping Patterns in Dry-Hot Valley Area
lQoYULHX.abstract: In the irrigated sloping farmland of Yunnan Yuanmou County dry-hot valley area,the light,heat and water utilization efficiency of the six different cropping patterns were investigated,for optimization of the efficiency cropping patterns of dry-hot valley sloping farmland.Results showed that corn-tomato pattern and tomato-rice pattern on the utilization of solar energy,as well as thermal acceptance coefficient,were relatively higher,and corn-bean pattern was relatively common pattern.For water using efficiency,corn-tomato pattern was the highest 55.69 kg/mm·hm2,rice-onion pattern was the lowest 7.546 kg/mm·hm2.Tomatoes for the longest harvest period,the highest yields,and market prices steadily up trend,corn and rice-tomato pattern were favorably received by peasants with good prospects for development.

K8Qq8A8l.title: Analysis of Economic Traits of Flue-cured Tobacco under Return of Straws from Preceding Crop
K8Qq8A8l.abstract: A set of experiments in the return and compost of straws from the preceding crop(wheat,rice and pea) of flue-cured tobacco were carried out,and principal component analysis and variance analysis for economic traits of flue-cured tobacco were performed.The result showed that the economic traits of flue-cured tobacco between return treatment and compost treatment of straws from preceding crops were significantly different.The effect of return or compost of straws in improving the economic traits of flue-cured tobacco was as follows: mixed straws > wheat straw > rice straw > pea straw.The compost of mixed straws had better effects in raising yield and production value of tobacco;the return of wheat straw could significantly increase the rate of the first class leaf of flue-cured tobacco in terrace or paddy field with higher fertility;straws from preceding crop should be only composted for tobacco in upland field with lower fertility.The influence of return of straws from preceding crop on economic traits of flue-cured tobacco was correlated with the subtraction of mineral N fertilizer application due to the return of straws.In order to obtain high quality and appropriate yield of flue-cured tobacco,the return of straws from the preceding crop should be cooperated with moderate application of mineral fertilizer.
keywords: Return of straws from preceding crop

cmemfasG.title: Effect of Soil Character on Nitrogen Mineralization of Tobacco Soil
cmemfasG.abstract: The effect of soil character on nitrogen mineralization of the tobacco soil by pot culture in greenhouse.The results showed that the nitrogen mineralization accumulation is remarkably different between the different soil types and the different tobacco grows stages.And the nitrogen mineralization rate are divided into three types during the tobacco growth stages:the from high to low type,from high to high type and from low to high type,there are clay and sandy soil in the from high to low type,which is beneficial to form the quality of tobacco;But when the nitrogen mineralization rate from low to high,which is extremely harmful to the tobacco quality formation.It is second significant correlation between the nitrogen mineralization accumulation and the soil grain composition,especially to the coarse sand(1-0.25 mm)and the clay soil(<0.001 mm)during the tobacco growth stage.It is better to the tobacco fields and quality formation when the soil composition with fine clay(<0.001 mm)under 37.0%,coarse silt(0.05-0.01 mm)composition with 5.5% to 16.3%,coarse sand(1-0.25 mm)with below 8.5%.

tRFTT12D.title: Tissue Culture of Yacon(Smallanthus sonchifolius)
tRFTT12D.abstract: A propagation system for yacon(Smallanthus sonchifolius)in tissue culture was established.Bacteria-free tips of yacon were used as explants and cultured on MS medium supplemented with different combinations of plant regulators.The results showed that the rate of adventitious shoot induction was up to 95% when the explants were cultured on MS + 1.0 mg/L BA + 0.2 mg/L NAA,and the average proliferation coefficients of generations 1-5 were up to 3-4 in one culture cycle.On the rooting medium of 1/2MS+0.2 mg/L IAA+0.2 mg/L NAA,a rooting rate of more than 92% was obtained.When transplanted onto a mixed substrate with humus soil and perlite,85% of the rooted plantlets survived.

R6RxvR9x.title: Relationship Between Quality and Vase Life of Cut Flowers
R6RxvR9x.abstract: Determination of SPAD-502 readings and chlorophyll content of the leaves of cut lily showed that preservative treatment increased SPAD and it had an important effect of protecting chlorophyll by delaying its degradation.The bacterium content of cut flowers of rose and gerbera was controlled by RVB of Holland,which improved the vase life of the flowers.Silver ions were detected in cut flowers of carnation and lily after RVB pretreatment,which are sensitive to silver.Determination of the contents of bacterium and silver in cut flowers could reflect indirectly if the flowers had been pretreated by preservatives.

y4cyyd4U.title: Uptake and Transport of Exogenous Cd and Pb in Baby Bokchoi
y4cyyd4U.abstract: The effects of different concentrations of cadmium(Cd),lead(Pb) and their combination on the uptake and transportation of Cd and Pb in plants were studied by means of water culture.The results showed that Pb and Cd mainly enriched in the baby bokchoi roots;the content of Cd and Pb in baby bokchoi had significant positive correlation with exogenous Cd and Pb concentrations(p<0.01).In the combined Pb-Cd treatment,the BCFCd of aerial part of baby bockchoi increased with the concentration of Pb in water culture,while BCFCd of root was the opposite,namely BCFCd of roots of baby bockchoi decreased with the concentration of Pb increased in water culture,indicated that exogenous Pb concentration can promote the enrichment of Cd in the leaves,but inhibited the enrichment of Cd in the roots;the BCFPb of aerial part of baby bockchoi decreased with the concentration of Cd in water culture,while BCFPb of roots was the opposite,namely BCFPb of roots of baby bockchoi increased with the concentration of Cd increasing in water culture,indicated that exogenous Cd concentration can promote the enrichment of Pb in the roots,but inhibited the enrichment of Pb in the leaves;Cd has a dual role in the Pb enrichment in baby bockchoi.The high concentration of Pb(≥500 mg/L) could promote the transfer of Cd from the root system of baby bockchoi to the aerial part,while Cd could inhibit the transfer of Pb from the the root system of baby bockchoi to the aerial part,which could keep more Pb in the roots of baby bockchoi.

x7MoKbMX.title: Effect of Soil Texture on Yield and Quality of Chinese Cabbage(Brassica pekinensis)
x7MoKbMX.abstract: The effect of soil texture on the yield and quality of Chinese cabbage(Brassica pekinensis)was studied by pot culture in greenhouse.The results showed that the Chinese cabbage yield was remarkably different for the different soil texture.Under the same fertilizer management conditions,the effect of different soil texture of the on the growth of vegetables yield was significant;the alpine Chinese cabbage grown in the soil with lighter bulk density and good permeability in plant height,leaf number,the compaction of the cabbage had good development,and had excellent appearance quality and production performance.Correlation analysis showed that there was a significantly positive correlation on the protein of Chinese cabbage between fine sand and clay of soil;the carbohydrates was significant correlation with sand,and was a negative correlation with clay;the dietary fibre was a negative correlation with clay;the nitrate content was a negative correlation with sand;the vitamin C was no significant correlation.In summary,based on Chinese cabbage production and safety quality,sandy soil texture type was more appropriate for the Chinese cabbage planting,followed by the soil with lighter bulk density and good permeability,and the neutral and alkaline loam rich in organic matter content.

pKXqibMe.title: A Preliminary Study on Aseptic Identification of Resistance of Carnation Varieties to Toxin Filtrate from Fusarium oxysporum f.sp.diathi
pKXqibMe.abstract: The resistance of eight carnation varieties to the toxin filtrate from Fusarium oxysporum f.sp.diathi was determined with aseptic seedlings for the first time.The result showed there were one highly resistant variety,four moderately resistant varieties,two moderately susceptible varieties,and one highly susceptible variety.In addition,we established a method to identify the resistance of carnation variety to toxin filtrate from F.oxysporum f.sp.diathi with aseptic seedling.

Lat5BRIk.title: Interaction and Correlation of Heavy Metal Compound Pollution in Soil-Flue-cured Tobacco System
Lat5BRIk.abstract: The interaction and correlation of heavy metal(As,Cd and Pb) compound pollution in soil-flue-cured tobacco system were studied through pot experiments.The results indicated that: in the soil polluted by these three kinds of heavy metal,the plant height,leaf number and biomass of flue-cured tobacco were all lower than those of the check,and the decrease in the biomass of tobacco plant in various treatments exhibited the following sequence: As+Cd+Pb>Cd+Pb>As+Pb>As+Cd>As>Pb>Cd.Cd had stronger mobile ability in tobacco plants than As and Pb.The content of both Pb and As in the soil was consistent with the accumulation of Cd in tobacco plants.The Cd content in the soil had an antagonistic effect on the accumulation of Pb in tobacco plants.As and Pb in the soil could occur deposition and passivation.The content of As and Cd in tobacco plants showed significant or very significant correlation with the content of As and Cd in the soil,while the Pb content in tobacco plants not only showed very significant correlation with the Pb content in the soil,but also revealed significant correlation with the As content in the soil.

jHXEum7q.title: Correlation between Soil Heavy Metal Pollution and Quality of Vegetable in Representative Sewage Irrigation Farming District
jHXEum7q.abstract: The single factor pollution index and the comprehensive pollution index were adopted to investigate the heavy metals(Hg,Cr,Cd,Pb,As,Cu,Ni) pollution of different irrigated soils and quality of vegetables in representative sewage irrigation farming district of Kunming city.The results showed that the soil environment was qualified for the second level criterion of "Standard of Soil Environment"(GB15618-1995).But some vegetables have been seriously polluted by heavy metals according to the national vegetable food criterion.The Cd content in the soil showed a significantly positive correlation with the Cd content in most vegetables,while there was no correlation between the As content in most vegetables and soil AS contamination.

iR6CNBhU.title: Determination of Loganin in Zuogui Pill by High Performance Liquid Chromatography
iR6CNBhU.abstract: Objective:To develop a method for determination of loganin in Zuogui pill by high performance liquid chromatography(HPLC).Methods:A HPLC system was used in the quantitative analysis of hesperidin on the reversed-phase column of Ec1ipse XDB-C18(4.6mm×250mm,5μm)with the mixed solvents of tetrahydrofuran-methanol-acetonitrile-0.05% phksphoric acid water solution.The flow rate was 1.0mL/min.Column temperature was 40℃.The eluate was monitored with UV absorption at 236nm.Results:The linear range of hesperidin was 0.0079 ~ 0.2530mg/mL(r =0.9993).The average recoveries(n=6)were 101.6%,with RSD of 2.1 %.Conclusion:The method is simple,accurate and reliable with good reproducibility.It can be used to evaluate and control the quality of Zuogui pill.

CX75xE6S.title: Content Determination of Catalpol in Zuogui Pills by HPLC
CX75xE6S.abstract: OBJECTIVE:To develop a method for the content determination of catalpol in Zuogui pills.METHODS:RP-HPLC system was used.The determination was performed on Eclipse XDB-C 18 column with acetonitrile-water(0.7:99.3,V/V) as mobile phase at the flow rate of 1.0 ml/min.Column temperature was 25 ℃.The detection wavelength was set at 210 nm and injection volume was 5 μl.RESULTS:The linear range of catalpol was 0.006 7-0.216 0 mg/ml(r=0.9996)with an average recoveries of 98.5%(RSD=1.72%,n=5).CONCLUSION:The method is rapid,simple,accurate and reliable.It can be used for the content determination of catalpol in Zuogui pills.

uHWb3O5R.title: The therapeutic action of AM injection for the function of hematopoiesis and disordered intestinal flora after leukemia chemotherapy
uHWb3O5R.abstract: Objective AiDi injection could improve the function of hematopoiesis,prop up the growth of normal intestinal flora.Methods To devide the patients randonly into two groups:AiDi injection during chemotherapy(experimental group)and chemotherapy only(Control group).The following data must be measured two weeks before and after chemotherapy :the level of IL-3 and GM-CSF,peripheral mature neutrophilic granulocyte count.Intestinal permanent flora(Enterobacteria,Enterococcus,Btfidobacterrim and Lactobacillea).Result All data showed remarkable differentce compared with the simple chemotheraphy group(P<0.05 or P<0.01).Conclusion AiDi injection can perform the function of improving the hematopoietic function and propping up the growth of nomal intestinal flora indeed.

YCp0YBYY.title: STUDY ON THE EFFECT OF BEIFEIDA ON THE INTESTINEM ICROECOLOGY AND CHANGE OF TONGUE PHASE OF PATIENT
YCp0YBYY.abstract: Objective:Observing the effect of Beifeida on the intestine microecology and change of tongue phase of patient.Methods:60 spleen-deficiency patients are devide into two groups randomly,30 as group Beifeida,30 as group norfloxacin.30 normal persons as control group.To observe the clinical change after treatment and to examine the bacteria change of excrement and tongue coating.Results:Beifeida are more effective than norfloxacin to the patients.The quantity of bifidobacterium in 60 spleen-deficiency patients excrement reduces obviously.The structure of tongue coating bacteria is diverse to the normal person.After treatment,quantity of bifidobacterium in excrement of group Beifeida increases obviously.Conclusion:1.intestine microolysbiosis and change of tongue coating bacteria are found on spleen-deficiency patients.2.Beifeida adjust the microolysbiosis of intestine and tongue coating,which is valid to spleen-deficiency patients.

zw5Ewd2c.title: Comparative Study on the Effect of Zuogui Pill with Liuweidihuang Pill on the Antioxygenation Ability and Ultrastructure in Aging Rat's Hippocampus
zw5Ewd2c.abstract: Objective:To analyze and compare the anti-aging function's mechanisms of the two invigorating yin formulas,Zuogui Pill and Liuweidihuang Pill,with different compatibilities of invigorating and reducing method and Sanbu group which is the main part of the two formulas.Methods:The effect of Zuogui Pill,Liuweidihuang Pill and Sanbu group which is the main part of the two formulas on the antioxygenation ability and ultrastructure in hippocampus of subacute aging rats induced by D-galactose was observed.Result:SOD and GSH-PX were cut down and MDA,lipofuscin and harming change of ultrastructure in hippocampus were stepped up in subacute aging rats resulted by D-gal.After the intervention of Zuogui Pill,Liuweidihuang Pill and Sanbu group,SOD and GSH-PX were raised in different degrees,MDA was degraded and the deposite of lipofuscin and damage of ultrastructure in hippocampus were reduced.Conclusion: It demonstrates that the anti-aging function of Zuogui Pill,Liuweidihuang Pill and Sanbu group might be related to degrading antioxygenation ability,cutting down the deposite of lipofuscin and brain damage and compatibility has an important effect on the stability of complex prescription of Chinese medicine indirectly.

2YJy6mUk.title: Comparative study to the effect of Zuogui Pill and Liuweidihuang Pill on the resistance ability to free radical and P16 proteinum expression in aging rat
2YJy6mUk.abstract: Objective To analyze and compare the anti-aging mechanisms of the two invigorating yin formulas,Zuogui Pill and Liuweidihuang Pill,with different compatibilities of invigorating and reducing method and Sanbu group which were the main part of the two formulas.Methods The effect of Zuogui Pill,Liuweidihuang Pill and Sanbu group which are the main part of the two formulas on the restraining ability to free radical and expressions of P16 in subacute aging rats induced by D-galactose were detected.Results T-AOC,the quantity of CAT and the ability of restraining superoxide radical anion were cut down and H2O2 and the expression of P16 were up-regulated in subacute aging rats resulted by D-gal.The changes above-mentioned were reversed by Zuogui Pill,and so did by Liuweidihuang Pill except H2O2.T-AOC was raised and P16 proteinum expression was degraded by Sanbu group but CAT,superoxide radical anion and H2O2 were not changed markedly.Conclusion The anti-aging function of Sanbu group is weaker than that of the two formulas.It indicates that correct compatibility has important effect on complex prescription of Chinese medicine.

6dnrUCme.title: Effect of Aidi injection combined with chemotherapy on life quality in advanced colorectal cancer patients
6dnrUCme.abstract: OBJECTIVE To observe the effect of Aidi injection combined with chemotherapy on life quality in advanced colorectal cancer patients. METHODS Sixty advanced colorectal cancer patients were randomly divided into two groups.The treatment group with 30 patients were treated with Aidi injection and chemotherapy.The control group with 30 patients were treated with chemotherapy only.The two groups were both given FOLFOX4 regiment treatment.The change in TCM symptoms,KPS,weight and appetite was observed after chemotherapy was given for four courses. RESULTS There were significant differences in syndrome scores,KPS,weight and appetite of the two groups(P<0.05). CONCLUSION Aidi injection can indeed improve TCM symptoms and life quality in advanced colorectal cancer patients.

qHv2CEyd.title: Study on the effect of Jianpishenshitang on the tongue microecology and change of tongue phase of patient
qHv2CEyd.abstract: Objective:Observing the effect of Jianpishengshitang on the tongue microecology and change of tongue phase of patient.Methods:90 spleen-deficiency patients devided into three groups randomly,30 as group Jianpishengshitang,30 as group Beifeida,30 as group norfloxacin,30 normal persons as contral group.To observe the clinical change after treatment and to examine the change of tongue bacteria and tongue phase.Results:Jianpishengshitang and Beifeida were more effective than norfloxacin to the patients.The structure of tongue coating bacteria was diverse to the normal person.After treatment,the abnormal tongue coating bacteria of group Jianpishengshitang and group Beifeida improved obviously.Conclusion:Jianpishengshitang adjust the microolysbiosis of tongue and tongue coating,which is valid to spleen-deficiency pacients.Jianpishengshitang is a ideal microecology modulator.

EMnuQ53v.title: Therapeutic Observation of 50 Patients with Presby-asthma by Using Shuxuening Injection
EMnuQ53v.abstract: Objective To investigate the treatment of presby-asthma's clinical observation by using shuxuening injection.Methods A total of 100 patients with presby-asthma were randomly divided into two groups,the treatment group is 50 instances,the control group is 50 instances.The control group is used by conventional therapy(anti-infection,spasmolysis,suppressing asthma and fluid replacement);on the base of the control group,the treatment group plus shuxuening injection(20 ml,iv gtt,q.d.,10d/ time of therapy).Observing the patients' changes of tussis,sputum,wheeze and wheezing rale,simultaneous recording ADR in course of therapy.Results The total effective rate of the treatment group is 90%,the control group is 68%.As compared with the control group,the treatment group has significance distinction(P<0.05),using shuxuening injection hasn't obvious ADR in course of therapy.Conclusion Shuxuening injection can improve the patients with presby-asthma's symptoms and physical sign obviously,not found obvious ADR.It is worth to spread to the hospital of primary level.

np0wvs7S.title: Study on intestinal flora and immune function of Aidi injection combined with chemotherapy in colorectal cancer patients
np0wvs7S.abstract: Objective To observe the effect of Aidi injection combined with FOLFOX4 chemotherapy on intestinal flora and immune function in advanced colorectal cancer patients.Methods Sixty advanced colorectal cancer patients were randomly divided into two groups.Group A of 30 patients were treated with Aidi injection 50 ml per day for 10 day and FOLFOX4 chemotherapy.Group B of 30 patients were treated with FOLFOX4 chemotherapy only.The following data must be measured before and after 10 day chemotherapy:intestinal permanent flora(Enterobacteria,Enterococcus,Bifidobacterirm and Lactobacillea) and T cell subgroup(CD3+,CD4+,CD8+,CD4+/CD8+).Results Compared with Group B,both Bacillus bifidus and Bacterium lacticum counts of Group A patients were apparently increased after chemotherapy(P<0.01),accompanied with CD8+ significantly lower and CD4+/CD8+ratio significantly increased(P<0.01).Conclusions Aidi injection can prop up the growth of normal intestinal flora indeed.The Aidi injection which is used during chemotherapy can decrease the influence on immune function and improve the quality of life in patients with advanced colorectal cancer.

CcfGr9VP.title: Clinical Study of Huaier Granule Combined with Chemotherapy for Advanced Colorectal Cancer Patients
CcfGr9VP.abstract: Objective:To observe the effect of Huaier granule combined with chemotherapy on TCM symptoms and life quality in advanced colorectal cancer patients.Methods:60 advanced colorectal cancer patients were randomly divided into two groups.30 patients in the treatment group were treated with Huaier granule and chemotherapy and the controlled group was treated with chemotherapy only.The two groups were both given FOLFOX4 regiment treatment.The changes in their TCM symptoms,KPS,weight and appetite were observed.The following data must be measured before the chemotherapy and 4 courses after it.Results:There was significant difference in their syndrome scores,KPS,weight and appetite(P<0.05).Conclusion:Huaier granule could improve TCM symptoms and life quality indeed.It was effective for advanced colorectal cancer patients.

uIFhCXfV.title: Clinical Effect of Kuier Granules in Advanced Colorectal Cancer Patients
uIFhCXfV.abstract: Objective: To observe the clinical application value of Kuier in the patients with advanced colorectal cancer.Method: 60 cases of advanced colorectal cancer patients were divided into the treatment group and the control group with 30 cases each.The treatment group was with the chemotherapy treatment and Kuier granules,and the control group was with the chemotherapy treatment only.The chemotherapy was with the FOLFOX4 protocols.The changes in T cell subgroup(CD3+,CD4+,CD8+ and CD4+/CD8+),the tumor size,liver and kidney functions,and the other safety indicators before and after the treatment were recorded.Result: Compared with those of the control group,the values of CD8+ in the treatment group were decreased,while CD4+/CD8+ was increased significantly(P<0.05).The differences in the tumor size and adverse reactions were not significant(P>0.05).Conclusion: Kuier granules combined with chemotherapy in the treatment of advanced colorectal cancer can obviously improve the immune function with mild toxicity and high safety,suggesting promising application value in clinics.

sP5Ym2yj.title: Clinical study on tongue coating bacteria and intestinal microdysbiosis of diarrhea patients due to spleen-deficiency
sP5Ym2yj.abstract: Objective To study the relevance of tongue phase,tongue coating bacteria and intestinal microdysbiosis by observing the intestine microecology and change of tongue phase of patients.Methods 30 spleen-deficiency patients were devided into three groups randomly,30 normal persons as control group.To observe the tongue and to examine the bacteria change of excrement and tongue coating.Results The quantity of bifidobacterium in 30 spleen-deficiency patients excrement reduced obviously.The strcture of tongue coating bacteria was diverse to the normal person.Conclusion Intestine microdysbiosis and change of tongue coating bacteria are found on spleen-deficiency pacients,which are interrelated.

UFL1orut.title: Study on the Intestine Microecological Changes and Curetive Effects of Irritable Bowel Syndrom by Massage Combined with Bifid
UFL1orut.abstract: Objective To study the curetive effects to irritable bowel syndrom(IBS) by massage combined with bifid.Methods 71 patients were randomly divided into three groups and respectively treated by bifid(23 cases)or massage(24 cases)and massage combined with bifido(24 cases) for two weeks.Obzerve the curetive effects and examine the bacteria change of Intestine.Results The number of bifidobacterium and lactobacillus increased significantly,enteric bacilli decreased in three groups after teatment (P<0.01).Massage combined with bifid was more effective than the other two groups.Conclusion Massage combined with bifido could adjust the themicrodysbiosis of intestine in the patients of IBS and improved the clinical symptoms.The curative effect of combined treatment was better than one only.

csWCHp3L.title: Study on Intestinal Flora of Jianpishenshi Decoction in Patients With Advanced Colorectal Cancer
csWCHp3L.abstract: Objective:To observe the effect on intestinal flora and the clinlic therapeutic efficacy of Jianpishenshi decoction combined with chemotherapy in patients with advanced colorectal cancer.Method:Sixty patients with advanced colorectal cancer were randomly divided into two groups.The treatment group with 30 patients were treated with Jianpishenshi decoction and chemotherapy.The control group with 30 patients were treated with chemotherapy only.The two group were both given FOLFOX4 regiment treatment.The clinlic therapeutic efficacy and the change on intestinal permanent flora(Enterobacteria,Enterococcus,Bifidobacterirm and Lactobacillea) and karnofsky(KPS),weight and appetite were observed.The following data were measured before and after chemotherapy given four courses.Result:Comparison of the two groups,the difference of clinlic therapeutic efficacy between the two groups was significant(P<0.05).Compared with the control group, both Bacillus bifidus and Bacterium lacticum counts of the treatment group patients were apparently increased after chemotherapy(P<0.01). There were significants in KPS,weight and appetite of the two groups(P<0.05).Conclusion:Jianpishengshi decoction can adjust nomal intestinal flora and improve life quality indeed which is valid to patients with advanced colorectal cancer.

xKlJT6Hy.title: Effect of the Tonify Yin Decoction with different supplementation and draining methods on ATPase,Bcl-2 and Bax in aging rats
xKlJT6Hy.abstract: Objective To analyze and compare the function mechanisms preliminarily of two Tonify Yin Decoction with different supplementation and draining methods and "three tonics" Chinese medicine of Sanbu group.Methods It was observed that the effect of Zuogui Pill,Liuwei Dihuang Pill and Sanbu Decoction which were the main part of the two Decoction on ATPase and expressions of Bcl-2 and Bax which were agents related with apoptosis in subacute aging rats induced by D-galactose(D-gal).Results Consequence of ATPase in the liver and brain of rats were cut down and the expression of Bcl-2 and Bax in the hippocamp zone of rats' brain were stepped up.After the intervention of Zuogui Pill,Liuwei Dihuang Pill and Sanbu Decoction,the activity of Na+-K+-ATPase and Ca2+-Mg2+-ATPase and the expressions of Bcl-2 were raised in different degree and the expressions of Bax was descended.Conclusion The anti-aging function of Zuogui Pill,Liuwei Dihuang Pill and Sanbu Decoction may be concerned with that this formula can retain the stability of cell envelope and restrain apoptosis.There are no disparities of anti-aging functions in the two formulas with different compatibilities of invigorating and reducing method.It demonstrates that the Sanbu Decoction has the prevalent function in the two Decoction.

onZUgSmC.title: The therapeutic action of AiDi injection for the function of toxicity reducing and efficacy enhancing and disordered intestinal flora after the chemotherapy to the acute leukemia patients
onZUgSmC.abstract: Objective AiDi injection could propp up the growth of normal intestinal flora,reduce the poisonous side effect of the medicine for chemotherapy and promote the effect of leukemia chemotherapy.Methods Used AiDi injection during chemotherapy(experimental group)and used chemotherapy only(Control group).The following data must be measured before and after chemotherapy,intestinal permanent flora(Enterobacteria,Enterococcus,Bifidobacterirm and Lactobacillea),bone marrow and the poisonous side effect after the chemotherapy.Results All data showed remarkable difference compared with the simple chemotherapy group(P<0.05 or P<0.01).Conclusions AiDi injection can propp up the growth of nomal intestinal flora indeed.The injection which is used during chemotherapy can reduce the poisonous side effect of the medicine for chemotherapy,so the chemotherapy can go on smoothly and promote the effect of chemotherapy for leukemia.

xsFU24J8.title: Transplantation of Human Umbilical Cord Blood Stem Cells in Treatmentof Experimental Acute Myocardial Ischemia in Rats
xsFU24J8.abstract: Objective To investigate a new method to cure acute myocardial ischemia(AMI)with human umbilical cord blood stem cells(HUCBSC)transplantation.Methods Ficoll-Hypague method was taken in separation and culture of HUCBSC.A total of 20 Wister rats were randomly divided as trial group and control group,with 10 in each.Some 60 min after establishment of AMI,200 μl of HUCBSC was transplanted into the ischemic myocardium in the trial group,while the same volume of human umbilical cord blood was transplanted into the ischemic myocardium in the control group.Three weeks later the examinations of cardiac function and pathology were conduced and the results were compared.Results The differences in thickness of anterior left ventricular wall(LVAW),left ventricular internal diameter at end-diastole(LVIDd),left ventricular internal diameter at end-systole(LVIDs),left ventricular end-diastolic volume(LVEDV),left ventricular end-systolic volume(LVESV),left ventricular fractional shortenin(FS)and left ventricular ejection fractions(EF)between the two groups showed statistic significance(P<0.05).Conclusion Transplantation of HUCBSC can improve myocardial function.
keywords: Human umbilical cord blood stem cells

bVuBPR9T.title: Study on the effect of Jianpishenshitang on the intestine microecology and change of tongue phase of patient
bVuBPR9T.abstract: Objective To observe the effect of Jianpishenshitang on the intestine microecology and change of tongue phase of patient.Methods 90 spleen-deficiency patients were devided into three groups randomly,30 as group Jianpishenshitang,30 as group Beifeida,30 as group norfloxacin.30 normal persons as contrastive group.To observe the clinical change after treatment and to examine the bacteria change of excrement and tongue coating.Results Jianpishenshitang and Beifeida were more effective than norfloxacin to the patients.The quantity of Bifidobacterium in 90 spleen-deficiency patients′ excrement reduced obviously.The structure of tongue coating bacteria was diversed to the normal person.After treatment,quantity of Bifidobacterium in excrement of group Jianpishenshitang and group Beifeida was increased obviously.Conclusions (1) Jianpishengshitang adjusts the microdysbiosis of intestine and tongue coating,which is valid to spleen-deficiency patients.(2) Jianpishengshitang is a ideal microecology modulator.

XxtTSII7.title: Relationship between Tongue Picture and Microecology in Patients with Lung Phlegm-Heat Cough
XxtTSII7.abstract: Objective To study the relationship of tongue fur thickness to clinical manifestation and microecology in patients with lung phlegm-heat cough.Methods Sixty-five patients with lung phlegm-heat cough were divided into thick fur group and thin fur group,according to tongue fur thickness,and 30 normal subjects were chosen as control group.A comparative analysis was conducted on clinical symptoms and total density of tongue flora.Results The tongue flora density was higher in thick fur and thin fur groups than in control group(P<0.01),it was the highest in thick fur group(P<0.05).The clinical symptoms of thick fur group were more severe(P<0.01).Conclusion Changes of tongue fur are correlated with tongue and lung micro-ecological disorders in patients with lung phlegm-heat cough,so glossoscopy is a major objective basis for judgement of this disease.

tpTb67CK.title: Effects of Aidi Injection Combined with Chemotherapy on Immune Function and Life Quality of Advanced Colorectal Cancer Patients
tpTb67CK.abstract: Objective:To observe the effect of Aidi injection combined with chemotherapy on immune function and life quality in advanced colorectal cancer patients.Method:Sixty-four advanced colorectal cancer patients were randomly divided into two groups.The treatment group with 32 patients was treated with Aidi injection and chemotherapy.The control group with the other 32 patients was treated with chemotherapy only.The two groups were both given FOLFOX4 treatment protocols.After 4 weeks,the changes in body immune state(CD_3~+,CD_4~+,CD_8~+ and CD_4~+/VCD_8~+ ),TCM symptom score,KPS,body weight and appetite before and after the treatment were observed. Result:Compared with that of the control group,CD_8~+ of the treatment group was significantly decreased while the ratio of CD_4~+/CD_8~+ was significantly increased after the chemotherapy(P<0.05).There were significant differences in TCM symptom score, KPS,body weight and appetite between the two groups(P<0.05).Conclusion:Aidi injection can enhance immune function and improve life quality indeed which is valid to advanced colorectal cancer patients.

A4eCxVMM.title: Effects of transcatheter closure and Sildenafil on plasma brain natriuretic peptide in patients with ventricular septal defects combined with moderate-severe pulmonary artery hypertension
A4eCxVMM.abstract: Objective To investigate the changes of plasma brain natriuretic peptide(BNP) concentration and mean pulmonary artery pressure(mPAP) in patients with ventricular septal defects(VSD) combined with moderate-severe pulmonary artery hypertension(PAH) after transcatheter closure and the influence of Sildenafil on them.Methods A total of 60 patients(≥18 years) with VSD combined with moderate-severe PAH hospitalized in our hospital between Jan 2008 and Aug 2012 were included in the study.They were divided into 3 groups randomly,20 in each group: group 1(treated with Sildenafil,20mg tid,),group 2(treated with Benazepril,7.5-20mg qd,) and group 3(no drug treatment).The plasma BNP concentration and mPAP were measured respectively before treatment,24 hours and 3months after transcatheter closure.Results Compared to the transcatheter closure before,the mPAP decreased and the plasma BNP concentration increased significantly in 24 hours after the procedure in all groups(all P < 0.05).Compared with group 3,significant decrease in plasma BNP concentration and mPAP was observed in group 1and group 2 after 3-month drug treatment(all P < 0.05) and the decrease in group 1 was greater than that in group 2.Conclusions The plasma BNP concentration and mPAP were decreased after transcatheter closure in adult VSD combined with moderate-severe PAH.The effect of Sildenafil is better than Benazepril in treating PAH after transcatheter closure.

xC0iHuRZ.title: Transcatheter closure of ruptured aneurysm of valsalva sinus
xC0iHuRZ.abstract: 【Objective】To discuss the clinical effects and security of transcatheter closure of ruptured aneurysm of valsalva sinus(RAVS).【Methods】Five patients admitted in our hospital,diagnosed as ruptured aneurysm of valsalva sinus drained into right atrium,and accepted transcatheter closure.During the regular one-month interval follow-up,echocardiography and ECG were performed.Cardiac murmur and size of each chamber before and after transcatheter closure were analyzed retrospectively.【Results】The procedures were successful in all patients.Cardiac murmur disappeared right after successful occlusion with domestic-madeoccluder.Left ventricular internal diameter decreased respectively from(62.5±9.4) mm before transcatheter occlusion to(47.5±4.3) mm one month after occlusion.No complications occurred.【Conclusion】Transcatheter closure of RAVS is safe and effective,and can substitute surgical operation in some patients of RAVS.

I25PKWRT.title: CHANGES OF SERUM VASCULAR ENDOTHELIAL GROWTH FACTOR AND THE THICKNESS OF PULMONARY VESSEL IN PATIENTS WITH CONGENITAL HEART DISEASE COMPLICATED WITH PULMONARY HYPERTENSION
I25PKWRT.abstract: Objective To investigate the changes of serum endothelial growth factors(VEGF) and the pulmonary vessel thickness in patients with congenital heart disease(CHD)complicated with pulmonary hypertension(PH).Methods 70 CHD patients were selected as experimental group and 20 non-CHD cases as control group;according to the levels of pulmonary arterial pressure,divided CHD patients into CHD with no PH group(25 cases),CHD with slight PH group(21 cases) and CHD with mild or severe PH group(24 cases).The concentrations of VEGF were detected by ELISA.The pulmonary vessel pathological changes were observed by micromorphometric method.Results VEGF level of CHD group was2.35±1.03pg/ml,significantly higher(P<0.05) than that of control group(1.89±0.25pg/ml);Along with the risen of pulmonary artery pressure,the level of VEGF was increasing.VEGF levels of CHD with mild PH group(2.62±0.79pg/ml) and CHD with severe PH group(2.66±1.37pg/ml) were higher than that of CHD with no PH group(1.83±0.52pg/ml).Compared with normal cases without CHD group(9.74±2.86%),mean medial thickness in pulmonary arterioles(mMTPA) of CHD group(29.45±13.53%) was significantly thicker(P<0.01).The concentration of VEGF was positively correlated with MPPA(r=0.380,p<0.05);mMTPA(r=0.448,P<0.05)and relative ration of vessel wall area/total(WA/TA) r=0.763,P<0.01),but negatively correlated with the relative ratios of vessel lumen area/total area(EA/TA)(r=-0.691,P<0.01).Conclusion VEGF takes part in the construction and development of pulmonary hypertension in CHD patients.
keywords: Endothelial growth factors Congenital heart disease Pulmonary hypertension

z9ZSLDo8.title: Epidemiological survey of congenital heart disease among people aged from 4 to 18 in Haidong area of Qinghai province]
z9ZSLDo8.abstract: To investigate the epidemiological characteristics of congenital heart disease (COHD) among 4 to 17 years old children in Haidong area of Qinghai province.All 97 718 children were surveyed with the following 3 steps: prescreening, countershock and confirmation with color Doppler. The distribution patterns were analyzed by national groups, ages and genders respectively.There were 496 COHD cases detected. The total incidence was 5.076 per thousand (496/97 718). The incidences of male and female were 5.046 per thousand (256/50 730) and 5.108 per thousand (240/46 988) (chi(2) = 0.018, P > 0.05). There was a significant difference between Pingan county and the others (chi(2) = 10.62, P < 0.01). The highest incidence was in Ledu (5.46 per thousand), the incidences of Huzhu and Pingan county were 5.45 per thousand and 3.64 per thousand respectively. There was no significant difference among different national groups (chi(2) = 0.33, P > 0.05). Among 496 COHD cases, the ratio of atrial septal defect (ASD), ventricular septal defect (VSD), patent ductus arteriosus (PDA) were 37.30%, 35.69% and 22.18% respectively.Total incidence of COHD was 5.076 per thousand in Haidong area of Qinghai province. The incidence was not different in both genders and national groups. The constitution of COHD in different counties were different.

otGxI1gP.title: CHANGES OF SERUM NITRIC OXIDE IN PATIENTS WITH CONGENITAL HEART DISEASE AT PLATEAU AREA
otGxI1gP.abstract: Objective To observe the changes of serum nitric oxide(NO) in patients with congenital heart disease(CHD) and its clinical significance.Methods the NO levels were determined by nitric acid reduction method.CHD patients were divided into 3 groups: mild pulmonary hypertension(PH)group(33 case),moderate pulmonary hypertension group(24 case) and severe pulmonary hypertension group(19 case),with 25 healthy person in control.Results The serum NO in patients with CHD is lower than that in control group(22.16 ± 7.13 μg/ μL vs 37.27 ±2.47 μg/ μL,P<0.01).The serum NO decreased with the rise of the pulmonary artery pressure simultaneously.There was a significant negative correlation between the pulmonary artery pressure and the level of NO(r=-0.768,P< 0.01).Conclusion NO plays an important role in congenital heart disease with pulmonary hypertension.
keywords: Plateau Congenital heart disease Nitric oxide Pulmonary hypertension

GdBPJR4X.title: Epidemiological survey of congenital heart diseases among Tibetan children aged from 4 to 8
GdBPJR4X.abstract: Objective The Epidemiological characteristics of congenital heart diseases(CHD) among Tibetan children living at altitude of 3500m aged from 4 to 8 are investigated. Methods 14056 children were surveyed with the following 3 steps: pre-screening, countercheck and diagnosed with color Doppler finally. The prevalence, disease distribution and gender differences were analyzed and compared among the 4 investigated counties. The prevalence of congenital heart diseases in Tibetan who had lived at high altitude for generations were compared with other ethnic groups. Results 155 CHD cases were discovered. The total prevalence rate was 10.956‰. The prevalence in female was 12.922‰, which was significantly higher than that of male( 9.246‰)(x2=4.345,P < 0.05). There was no statistical significant difference among each county in which the prevalence Henan was 13.124‰, Zeku, Jianzha, Tongren was 13.09‰, 10.242‰ and 8.054.10‰ respectively. There was significant difference among different ethnical groups (x2=10.708, P < 0.05). The prevalence of Tibetan and Mongolia was statistically higher than that of Han (x2=9.943, P < 0.005)、(x2=7.342, P < 0.001). Patent ductus arteriosus(PDA), artial septal defect(ASD), persistent foramen ovale(PFO) and ventricular septal defect(VSD) ranked as the top 4 defects. The frequency of these 4 conditions was 40.00%, 25.81%, 14.09% and 13.55% respectively. Conclusions CHD prevalence in female is statistically higher than that of male. The prevalence of CHD in Tibetan and Mongolia is statistically significantly higher than that of other ethnical groups. PDA is the major type of CHD.
keywords: Congenital heart disease Epidemiological survey Prevalence

SIbqxrOk.title: Intervention plugging treatment of great type patent ductus arterious complicated with pulmonary hypertension in Qinghai province
SIbqxrOk.abstract: Objective:To evaluate the clinical curative effect and the safety of transcatheter closure large patent ductus arteriosus(PDA) with pulmonary hypertension in Qinghai province patients. Method:The 105 patients with large PDA complicated with pulmonary hypertension accepted transcatheter closure.The average diameter of PDA was(16.4±3.2)mm with main pulmonary artery pressure of(63.5±3.9)mmHg(1 mmHg=0.133 kPa).All patients were followed from 2 months to 8 years. Result:All patients were occluded successfully.There were no complications either after the operation or during follow-up visit.There was small residual shunt in seven patients.Transhoracic echocardiography 1 week and 1,3,6,12 monthes after the procedure showed that the shunt of PDA disappeared in 98 cases,but a small amountresidual shunt in seven patients.Main pulmonary artery pressure was(32±2.5)mmHg.Enhanced LVEF and activity endurance were observed in all patients. Conclusion:Transcatheter closure of large PDA with pulmonary hypertension is a safe and effective intervention therapy and has a very good short-term result.

zsKxnLfP.title: Surgical treatment of chronic constrictive pericarditis at high altitude
zsKxnLfP.abstract: Objective:To summarize the clinical experience of operative treatment and perioperative treatment of chronic constrictive pericarditis at high altitude. Method:The clinical data of 76 patients with chronic constrictive pericarditis were analysed retrospectively,and all patients were applied section pericardial peel from sternal incision under general anaesthesia. Result:Three patients died postoperatively,2 cases were severe low cardiac output syndrome and the other case was respiratory failure.Complications appeared in 17 cases,secondary thoracotomy hemostatic technique was required for too much drainage in 6 cases.The average hospital stays after operation was(15.3±6.4) days and the clinical symtoms were significantly improved.Tuberculosis was the main cause of constrictive pericarditis in this cohort(64.4%,49/76). Conclusion:Pay attention to special pathophysiological change of chronic constrictieve pericarditis on the plateau,early diagnosis,adequate preoperative preparation,the scope of pericardiectomy and appropriate management of postoperative complications are the key to ensure success of the operation and the satisfactory prognosis.

28ZsafPa.title: A cross-sectional study of congenital heart disease among children aged from 4 to 18 years at different altitudes in Qinghai province, China]
28ZsafPa.abstract: The epidemiological characteristics of congenital heart disease (CHD) in children aged from 4 to 18 years were investigated in Qinghai province.Altogether 288 066 children inhabiting at 6 prefectures and 3 counties were examined by the following three steps: pre-screening, re-examination and diagnosis with color Doppler. And the entity distribution was analyzed while the differences were compared by age, gender, altitudes and nationalities respectively.Altogether 1633 cases of CHD were discovered. The total prevalence of CHD was 5.71 per thousand. The prevalence of CHD was found to increase with the increase of altitude by 4.89 per thousand at the altitude of 2535 m, 5.71 per thousand at 3600 m, and 8.74 per thousand at 4200 m respectively. There were significant differences among different altitude (chi(2) = 54.696, P < 0.001). chi(2) trend analysis showed the increase with chi(2) = 41.826(P < 0.001). The total incidence of CHD in females was 6.95 per thousand, which was significantly higher than that in males with 4.54 per thousand (chi(2) = 73.79, P < 0.001). There were significant differences between males and females at the altitude of 3000 m (chi(2) = 84.733, P < 0.001) and 4000 m (chi(2) = 16.313, P < 0.001) except at the altitude of 2000 m (chi(2) = 0.807, P > 0.05). The prevalence of CHD in different age groups was statistically significant at the every altitude of 2000 m (chi(2) = 18.138, P < 0.001), 3000 m (chi(2) = 18.544, P < 0.001) and 4000 m (chi(2) = 27.535 P < 0.001). The prevalence of CHD was increasing with the increase of age groups at the altitude of 3000 m (chi(2) = 19.230, P < 0.001) and 4000 m (chi(2) = 26.894, P < 0.001) except at the altitude of 2000 m. Within the prevalence of CHD of different nationalities, there was a significant difference with chi(2) = 24.456 (P < 0.001). Within the constituent rate of CHD, the prevalence of atrial septal defect (ASD) was as high as 37.42%, followed by the prevalence of patent ductus arteriosus (PDA) as 28.47% and ventricular septal defect (VSD) as 26.01%. Regarding the four categories of CHD, the constituent rate varied at different altitudes. For example, the prevalence rate of ASD constituted 37% at the altitude of 2000 m and 3000 m, and that of PDA accounted for 46.36% at the altitude of 4200 m.The epidemiological characteristics of CHD in Qinghai children were possibly associated with altitude levels.

DhJQBUlX.title: RELATIONSHIP OF SERUM NITRIC OXIDE AND PLASMA ENDOTHELIN LEVELS IN PATIENTS  WITH CONGENITAL HEART DISEASE COMPLICATED  WITH PULMONARY HYPERTENSION
DhJQBUlX.abstract: Objective To explore the function and clinic significance of NO and ET-1 in patients with COHD complicated with pulmonary hypertension(PH).Methods According to the degree of PH,75 cases with COHD were divided into 3 groups: none-PH group(25cases),mild PH group(25 cases) and mid-severe PH groups(24 cases).Meanwhile,other 25 normal cases were selected as the compared group.Measured the NO and ET-1 in blood by radioimmunoassy and nitrate reduction enzyme process.The ratio of NO/ET-1 was calculated.Results The ET-1 level of COHD group was 46.18±2.541 pg/ml,which is significantly higher than control group 25.75±3.87 pg/ml(P<0.005);the NO in COHD group 23.82±6.46 μg/ml was significantly lower than control group(37.27±2.47 μg/ml P<0.001).NO/ET-1 ratio in COHD group was 0.68±0.39,significantly lower than that of control group(1.18±2.80,P<0.001).The NO level of mid-severe PH group was significantly higher than that of none-PH group and mild-PH group(P<0.001).The pulmonary artery pressure was negatively correlated with the level of NO(r=-0.813,P<0.001).Conclusion It is play an important role in PH formation and development that increasing of ET-1 and decreasing of NO and the ratio of NO/ ET-1 in cases with COHD.
keywords: Congenital heart disease Pulmonary hypertension Nitric oxide Endothelin-1

Ye6yjLHX.title: Prevention and management of complications of interventinal threrapy for congenital heart desease patients in highland
Ye6yjLHX.abstract: Objective:To explore the treatment and preventions of complications by interventional threrapy for congenital heart disease in the high altitude.Method:Interventional procedures of congenital heart disease were performed in 968 cases(650 males and 330 females).Among them,586 cases were patent ductus artery(PDA);340 aerial septal defect(ASD);41 ventricular septal defact(VSD).The complications and therapy were reviewed.Result:The technique success rate was 98%.There were no death found in the research.The overall severe complication rate was 1.75%(15/968)while the overall light complication was 0.62%(6/968).Conclusion:Interventional treatment is an effective,simple,safe and first choice technique for the treatment of congenital heart disease.

jDSSRx7j.title: Risk factors of pulmonary arterial hypertension in patients with atrial septal defect at high altitude area]
jDSSRx7j.abstract: To analyze risk factors of pulmonary arterial hypertension (PAH) in patients with atrial septal defect (ASD) patients living at above 2000 m high altitude area.We retrospectively analyzed the incidence of PAH in 526 ASD patients out of 1178 congenital heart disease patients who were hospitalized in Qinghai cardiovascular hospital between January 2007 to December 2009 and explored the risk factors including gander, age, altitude, defect size and nationalities for developing PAH in ASD patients using binary logistic regression.PAH prevalence was 68.4% (360/526) in ASD patients. The risk factors of developing PAH in these ASD patients were defect size (OR: 1.200, 95%CI: 1.156 - 1.246, P = 0.000), age (OR: 1.027, 95%CI: 1.003 - 1.052, P = 0.025) and altitude (OR: 1.389, 95%CI: 1.001 - 1.637, P = 0.043) while gender and nationality were not risk factors for PAH. The incidence of developing PAH increased with aging (P = 0.000). The standardized ratio of PAH at ≥ 3500 m was 74.8% which was significantly higher than that at 2000 - 2499 m altitude (66.2%, P = 0.005) and at 2500 - 3499 m altitude (66.9%, P = 0.005).The risk for developing PAH is high in patients living at high altitude area. The risk factors of developing PAH in ASD patients living at high altitude are defect size, age and altitude.

tbs6A2uV.title: CHANGES OF PLASMA BRAIN NATRIURETIC PEPTIDE IN ADULT CONGENITAL HEART DISEASE COMBINED WITH PULMONARY ARTERY HYPERTENSION AFTER TRANSCATHETER CLOSURE
tbs6A2uV.abstract: Objective To investigate the relation between plasma brain natriuretic peptide(BNP)concentration and mean pulmonary artery pressure(mPAP)and the changes of plasma BNP concentration in adult congenital heart disease(CHD)combined with pulmonary artery hypertension(PAH)after transcatheter closure.Methods The patients were divided into 3 groups:Non-PAH group(mPAP<25mmHg),mild PAH group(25mmHg≤mPAP<35mmHg)and moderate-severe PAH group(mPAP≥35mmHg).30 healthy subjects were used as control.The relation between BNP concentration and mPAP was analyzed before the transcatheter closure and the plasma BNP concentration was measured respectively before and 24 hrs,3m after procedure.Results No statistical difference of gender,age and left ventricular ejection fraction(LVEF)were found among the 3 groups.Compared with control group,no rise of mPAP was found in Non-PAH group(P>0.05).The plasma BNP concentration before the closure in all 3 groups was higher than that in control group and gone up with the rise of mPAP.That is,the plasma BNP concentration in moderate-severe PAH>mild PAH>Non-PAH>control group.There was a positive correlation between BNP and mPAP(r=0.604,P<0.01).Compared to that before transcatheter closure,the plasma BNP concentration raised 24 hrs after the procedure in all 3 groups,but statistical difference was found only in non-PAH group.Significant decrease was found in all 3 groups 3 months later(P<0.05).Conclusion There was a positive correlation between plasma BNP and mPAP in adults with CHD combined with PAH.The plasm BNP concentration increases first then decreases after transcatheter closure.It may be used as a marker to evaluate the degrees of PAH and prognosis of the CHD patients.
keywords: Adult Congenital heart disease Pulmonary artery hypertension Transcatheter Brain natriuretic peptide

IgAGkwpn.title: The effects of progesterone receptor silencing on the chemo-drug sensitivity and endocrine therapy for endometrial cancer cell line Ishikawa
IgAGkwpn.abstract: Objective To study the effects of progesterone receptor(PR) silencing on the chemo- drug sensitivity and endocrine therapy for endometrial cancer cell line Ishikawa using siRNA targeting PR. Methods The PR targeting siRNA was transfected into Ishikawa cells by lipofectamine. The mRNA and protein levels of PR were assessed by RT- PCR and WB 24 hours after transfection. The viability of Ishikawa cells treated with siRNA and paclitaxel,adriamycin or progestogen was assessed by CCK8 method to calculate the IC50. After stained by Annexin V / PI and Hochest33342,the apoptosis ratio and cell morphological change were assessed with FCM and fluorescence microscope. Results The mRNA and protein of PR were reduced by more than 75% with PR targeting siRNA. Meanwhile,significant increase of IC50 and reduction of apoptosis ratio were observed in transfected groups than single drug groups(P<0. 05). Conclusion PR targeting siRNA- induced PR silencing can reduce chemo- drug sensitivity and endocrine therapy for endometrial cancer cell line Ishikawa.

XNnVXWDv.title: The application of intraoperative electrical stimulation during systematic nerve-sparing radical hysterectomy.
XNnVXWDv.abstract: Objective To evaluate the feasibility for confirming the preservation of the parasymphathetic nerve pathway during systematic nerve-sparing radical hysterectomy(SNSRH) using intraoperative electrical stimulation(IES).Methods Eighteen patients with cervical cancer and two patients with endometrial carcinoma underwent SNSRH.IES were performed on pelvic splanchnic nerve(PSN) while recording the electromyographyic(EMG) activity of the vesical detrusor using neurological monitoring system.The residual urine at eighth day,the duration of postoperative catheterization,the first exhaust time and stool time were observed.Results Evokable potentials were recorded in 18 out of 20 patients,called IES-positive.Its residual urine at eighth day was(148.83±141.81)mL.The average duration of postoperative catheterization was(9.89±2.70) days.The first exhaust time and stool time were(60.29±22.73) and(104.29±37.60) hours respectively.For the remaining 2 IES-negative patients,the residual urine was 580mL and 210mL.The durations of postoperative catheterization were 19 and 25 days respectively.Conclusion During SNSRH,IES based on the measurement of EMG activity is a useful tool for confirmation of the preservation of the parasymphathetic nerve pathway innervating the bladder and prediction of the postoperative bladder function.

HcCumnhj.title: Study of integrated state of HPV-16 infection in cervical cancer and precancerous tissues]
HcCumnhj.abstract: To investigate the prevalence of physical state of HPV-l6 DNA in cervical cancer and cervical precancerous carcinoma.Multiplex PCR was adopted to detect the physical state of HPV in samples from 252 patients with cervical carcinoma, including 48 samples of cervical cancer, 204 cervical intraepithelial neoplasia (CIN ) (125 CIN I, 46 CIN II and 33 CIN III) and 20 normal samples from the subjects with hysteromyoma undergoing hysterectomy, respectively.Among 48 patients with cervical cancer, 31 (65.6%) were infected with HPV-16. Eighteen among 31 (58.1%) HPV-16 infected patients with cervical cancer were found to have integrated infection of HPV-16. The positive rates of HPV-16 infection in the patients with CIN I, CIN II and CIN III were 19.2%, 34.8% and 42.4%, and the integrated infection rates of HPV-16 were 16.7%, 18.8% and 35.7%, respectively. Compared with patients with different grades of CIN, the integrated rate of HPV-16 infection in those with cervical cancer was significantly elevated.Among the patients with HPV-16 infection, the integrated state of HPV-16 is positively correlated with the severity of cervical lesions. Combined HPV typing test and detection of integrated viral state contribute to predicting the prognosis of patients with cervical precancerous lesions and increasing the accuracy of screening cervical cancer on the basis of HPV DNA detection.

0Qpes3sC.title: Anatomical classification of the internal iliac artery in Chinese women based on the three-dimensional reconstruction of computed tomographic angiography
0Qpes3sC.abstract: Objective to explore the anatomical classification and characteristics of Chinese female internal iliac artery based on computed tomographic angiography.Methods The original computed tomographic angiography datasets of 170 consecutive in-patients were collected in the Gynecology Department of Nanfang Hospital,Southern Medical University from August 2009 to October 2010,input the datasets into the mimics 10.01 software to reconstruct the 3D pelvic arterial network.The internal iliac arteries were classified according to Yamaki et al and compared with Japanese data.Results All of the internal iliac arteries(n=340) were reconstructed and classified successfully.Group A and group B were the most common types in Chinese women,accounting for 70.3%(239/340) and 27.6%(94/340) respectively.Group C accounted for only 2.1%(7/340) and no group D was found.The anatomical classification of bilateral internal iliac artery were identical in 68.8%(117/170) of the women studied.Compared with Japanese classification data,the difference was statistically significant(?字2=7.941,P=0.047).Conclusion Three-dimensional reconstruction technology based on computed tomographic angiography is a good method to study the anatomic typing and characteristic of iliac artery.

P6errucS.title: The significance of the construction of digital three-dimensional model in vivo for uterus myoma's arterial network based on CTA
P6errucS.abstract: Objective To explore the method and significance of constructing the digital three-dimensional model in vivo for uterus myoma's arterial network based on computed tomographic angiography (CTA).Methods A series of Dicom 3.0 images were obtained from a patient with uterus myoma by utilizing dual source CTA.Then the Mimics 10.01 was used to construct the pelvic and the arterial network of uterus myoma,the images of the pelvic and the arterial network of uterus myoma were constructed and futher registered and fused by using the Mimics 10.01.Results The digital model showed every ascending branches of the pelvic arterial network clearly,especially the arteries that supply the leiomyoma.What's more,the model could not only provided the 3D overview from multi-direction and multi-angles for doctors,but also exactly measured the bifurcate angles and diameter of arteries that correlated closely with clinical application by using Mimics software.Conclusion The uterus myoma's arterial network model in vivo could be successfully constructed by using the technique of computer 3D reconstruction with database collected through CTA,which may provide the basis for chosing individualization evaluation and therapy of patients with leiomyoma.

k4xLCodi.title: Qualitative and quantitative research of blood vessel in the ligament of the three dimensional ring around the cervix
k4xLCodi.abstract: Objective To explore the disposition,quantity,proportion and clinical significance of blood vessel in the cardinal ligament,uterosacral ligament and paracolpium complex of the three-dimensional ring around the cervix of cervical cancer.Methods Fresh specimens were collected from patients who had underwent radical hysterectomy,and cut into near,middle and far segment The cardinal ligament,uterosacral ligament were subdivided into superficial and deep part from the middle.Blood vessel were quantitative analysis using Impro image analysis software and biosystem stereology after HE,CD34 immunohistochemistry and aldehyde fuchsin — periodic acid Schiff's double staining.Results(1) Qualitative research:CD34 staining identified the existence of the arteriovenous in three ligaments.HE staining identified the existence of blood vessel that contains a lot of middle,small and micro arteriovenous.Aldehyde fuchsin — periodic acid Schiff's double staining showed that the artery elastic fibers are amaranth and the artery antrum inside was rose Bengal.(2) Quantitative research;The vessel in the cardinal ligament was concentrated on the superficial part(0.2153 ±0.0992)(P < 0.01),and there was no significant difference from near,middle and far segment(P >0.05).The vessel in the uterosacral ligament had no significant difference among the near,middle and far segment(P >0.05),also between the superficial and deep part(P > 0.05).The vessel in the paracolpium complex was mainly distributed in the near segment(0.1280 ± 0.1133) and far segment(0.1230 ±0.1152),little in the middle segment(0.0458 ±0.0439)(P <0.01).Conclusions The distribution of the blood vessel in the three primary ligament of the three-dimensional ring around the cervix is regular.These distribution characteristics mean importantly in dealing with the ligament of the three-dimensional ring around the cervix,reducing bleeding and preventing the damage of organs around when surgery.

57BQKXuP.title: Inhibited progesterone receptor membrane component-1 by shRNA plasmid to increased drug sensitivity of endometrial carcinoma cell
57BQKXuP.abstract: OBJECTIVE:To determine whether chemo-sensitivity of endometrial cancer cell line Ishikawa will be increased through the silence of progesterone receptor membrane component-1(PGRMC1) gene by shRNA plasmid.METHOD: Design and construct the shRNA1 and 2 plasmid targeting PGRMC1,and shRNA3 was control.One week later,GFP positive ratio was detected,the mRNA and protein of PGRMC1 by FCM,RT-PCR and Western blot method.The drug sensitivity for ADM,5-FU and DDP were detected by CCK8 method.Annexin Ⅴ staining was used to identify apoptotic cells by FCM.Meanwhile the intracellular ROS level was detected by FCM too.RESULTS: shRNA could duplicate and passage stably.shRNA1 and 2 inhibited the expression of PGRMC1 both on mRNA and protent level significantly.After inhibiton of PGRMC1,the drug sensitivity of Ishikawa increased.In the same drug concentration,the apoptosis ratio and ROS level of shRNA1 and 2 groups were more higher than that of the shRNA3 and control group.CONCLUSION: PGRMC1 play important role in regulating drug resistance of endometrial cancer.

bFyvBoss.title: Mechanism of bortezomib in inducing apoptosis and improving chemosensitivity of Ishikawa cells]
bFyvBoss.abstract: To investigate the effect of bortezomib on the apoptosis and drug sensitivity of endometrial cancer cell line Ishikawa cells.The IC50 of bortizomib, ADR, DDP and PTX in Ishikawa cells was determined using MTT method. After treatment with IC50 bortezomib for 6 and 12 h, the expressions of caspases-3, caspases-9 and bcl-2 genes were detected by RT-PCR, and the cell apoptotic rate and ROS level Ishikawa cells were evaluated by flow cytometry after treatment with half of the IC50 of the drugs for 24 h.The IC50 of bortizomib, ADR, DDP, and PTX was 71.6 nmol/L, 0.572 micromol/L, 67.4 micromol/L and 719.5 nmol/L, respectively. Bortizomib significantly increased the mRNA expressions of caspases-3 and caspases-9 but decreased the expression of bcl-2. Compared with the treatment with agents alone, combined treatment of the cells significantly improved the cytotoxicity of the chemotherapeutic agents (P<0.05) and increased the ROS level and the apoptosis of the cells.Bortizomib can inhibit the protein kinase to induce the apoptosis and enhance the chemosensitivity of Ishikawa cells.

aJg6uVE7.title: Classical and nerve-sparing radical hysterectomy: an evaluation of the nerve trauma in cardinal ligament.
aJg6uVE7.abstract: This study evaluated histopathology and clinical outcome of autonomic nerve trauma and vessels removal within the cardinal ligament (CL) during nerve-sparing radical hysterectomy (NSRH) compared with radical hysterectomy (RH).25 women with FIGO stage Ib1-IIa cervical cancer underwent RH (n=13) or NSRH (n=12). Removed CLs lengths were measured. Biopsies were collected from the proximal, middle and distal segment of CLs and fixed. Different markers were used for immunohistochemisty analysis: tyrosine hydroxylase for sympathetic nerves; vasoactive intestinal polypeptide for parasympathetic nerves; CD34 for blood vessels; and D2-40 for lymphatic vessels. The volume density (Vv), a parameter of biological stereology, was used to quantitatively measure CL components, while post-operative functions, such as defecation, micturition and two-year disease free survival in RH and NSRH groups were compared.The nerves mainly existed in the middle and distal segments of CLs. The Vv was greater in RH compared with NSRH for both sympathetic and parasympathetic nerve markers (P<0.05), while the Vv of blood and lymphatic vessels were same in the two groups. Average time to achieve residual urine≤50ml and first defecation were shorter in NSRH than in RH (P<0.05).Less autonomic nerves within CL are transected in NSRH than in RH, while blood/lymphatic vessels are efficiently removed in both treatments. Compared to RH, NSRH decreases iatrogenic injury, which leads to reduced post-operative co-morbidities, with ensure the same radicality.

uwIedEMw.title: Stochastic Customer Vehicle Routing Problem and Its Algorithm Analysis
uwIedEMw.abstract: To solve the vehicle routing problem with stochastic customer(VRPSC),this paper discusses the real-time dynamic planning mechanism of VRPSC,combined with different characteristics of the demand of the transported goods,analyses two kinds of different service tactics when the vehicle meets the route fails.And the corresponding models are established.With the designed ant colony optimization for VRPSC it uses the benchmark of 60 nodes to test the dynamic models of VRPSC.Results indicate that the data excavate on customer information is carried on to obtain accurate experience probability and using partly service strategy to shorten the general vehicle routing.It offers a scientific basis for reducing the vehicle operating cost.

antgN4sg.title: Studies on the Distribution Routing Problems in Tobacco Logistics
antgN4sg.abstract: With the development of modern commerce,logistics construction becomes a key factor for tobacco enterprises to enhance their core competitiveness.With the energy cost unceasingly climbing,it is urgent to frame a reasonable vehicle routing to reduce the function cost of tobacco enterprises.The current research of vehicle routing question generally limits to the distribution among fewer nodes,but the tobacco delivery relates to much more nodes.In view of this,this article used the ant colony optimization to study the vehicle routing question of tobacco enterprises.The simulation experiment demonstrated that this method could obtain better results.

Wj4ra5IV.title: Design of the Stability of the Cycle Industry Cluster Symbiotic Union——Based on the Profit Distribution
Wj4ra5IV.abstract: Cycle industry cluster is the best context of low-carbon economy industrial organization model,has important significance for the sustainable development of the national economy.Pointes out that the recycling industry cluster model is the realistic choice of current Chinese industrial harmonious development of economy and ecological environment.As an advanced industrial organization model,the recycling industry is extremely complex composition of the cluster,there are many variables in the actual running,of which the interests of the union,the reasons which led to the uneven distribution of the recycling industry cluster supply chain inefficiencies,and even the disintegration of the actual risk is particularly prominent,profit distribution mechanism is efficient operation of the recycling industry clusters and the key to persistence.To solve this problem,the paper uses game theory to build profit distribution model of cycle industrial clusters and does the corresponding mathematical analysis.The results show that the cooperative game model shows the interaction between the Alliance(competition and cooperation),the distribution of the result is more reasonable than the traditional method,the recycling industry can better balance the interests of all enterprises within the cluster relationship,and enhance the recycling industry cluster symbiotic alliance stability.

gDbzI3dk.title: Urban traffic flow simulation based on GERT random network
gDbzI3dk.abstract: Due to the problems that previous research in constructing urban traffic flow models applies only to the un-crowding city traffic characters which can′t simulate the traffic jam phenomenon,traffic time greatly depends on the traffic load change of city traffic space-time distribution network,random network graph evaluation and review technique(GERT) is used to simulate the city traffic flow.This method can reflect the path of traffic flow between the internal logic into account,which is out of the reach of common dynamic traffic planning models,so as more realistic for dynamic transport planning guidance.The fountain transport hub case study in Guiyang demonstrates that this method can provide a strong support for urban transportation planning decision.

390eSuYG.title: Dynamic Symbiosis Stability of Industrial Clusters Based on Subjective Game
390eSuYG.abstract: The industrial cluster has higher competitive advantage and economic efficiency,is the process of the China's accelerated industrialization and urbanization,and the effective way to the stability and rapid development of regional economic.However,the industrial cluster is not a natural ability to have synergies,the results also failed to in-depth study of existing structure of industrial clusters dynamic mechanism,which is a reasonable guide the development of industrial clusters dynamic symbiosis caused some of the missing.To solve this problem,the paper uses subjective game theory to analysis the evolution mechanism of dynamic symbiotic stable system of industrial clusters.The results show that the dynamic symbiotic stability conditions of industrial clusters depends on the gap between the level of game income of clusters and the changes in their own way to achieve gains and other factors.By analysis of the development process of the dynamic symbiosis of Detroit automobile industry cluster the paper completes test of the model.

J9S460yh.title: An Evolutionary Game Analysis of Logistic Enterprises Strategic Alliance in China
J9S460yh.abstract: Facing the new situation and multiple competitions brought by the entry of foreign logistic enterprises,China's logistic enterprises need to establish strategic alliances to enhance their competitiveness and ability to resist risks.From the perspective of bounded rational of logistic enterprises in practice,this paper uses evolutionary game theory to analyze the principles of the distribution of benefits and stability of China's logistic enterprises strategic alliance,so as to provide a useful reference to build a stable and efficient mechanism for the logistic enterprises alliance.

DBrXIiHy.title: Investigations of financing status for mental health service in Shanghai
DBrXIiHy.abstract: Objective: To investigate the financing status for mental health service in Shanghai, and provide policy advice for improvement of mental health financing mechanism in Shanghai. Methods: The income status (government investment, medical income, drug income and the other income) and expenditure status (special financial expenditure, personnel expenditure, public expenditure and individual and family subsidiary expenditure) of Shanghai Mental Health Center and 19 district mental health centers of Shanghai in 2008 were investigated with self-designed questionnaires, and the data of total income and total expenditure of Shanghai mental health institutions in 2008 was obtained. Results: The total income of Shanghai mental health institutions in 2008 was 774. 610 0 million yuan, and government investment, medical income, drug income and the other income accounted for 21.37% , 48.34%, 28.25% and 2.04%, respectively. The total expenditure of Shanghai mental health institutions in 2008 was 863.399 8 million yuan, and special financial expenditure, personnel expenditure, public expenditure and individual and family subsidiary expenditure accounted for 8.45%, 40.91%, 47.39% and 3.25%, respectively. Conclusion: The government investment in mental health service is relatively lower in Shanghai. Government should invest more in mental health service, and establish a multichannel, multidirectional and multilevel financing mode.

BLhfdvH3.title: Perceived environment system of tobacco experimentation among junior middle school students in Shanghai
BLhfdvH3.abstract: Objective To analyse the perceived environment system of tobacco experimentation among junior middle school students in Shanghai.Methods Cross-sectional study was conducted among 12 413 students from 23 junior middle schools in Shanghai by stratified cluster sampling.The conditions of tobacco experimentation and perceived environment system of these students were surveyed.The potential factors in perceived environment system were assessed using Logistic regression analysis,and their impact on tobacco experimentation was analysed.Results The rate of tobacco experimentation in junior middle school students was 6.8%.The rate of tobacco experimentation of boy students was 9.3%,which was significantly higher than that of girl students(4.6%)(P<0.001).Multivariate regression analysis indicated that 7 factors in perceived environment system had impact on tobacco experimentation in junior middle school students,which included high smoking press from peers(OR=4.12,95%CI: 3.50-4.84),more exposure to cigarette smoke in family(OR=1.46,95%CI: 1.38-1.96),more exposure to smoking from media(OR=1.40,95%CI:1.19-1.65) and high tobacco use acceptance(OR=1.37,95%CI:1.17-1.60).Conclusion Factors in perceived environment system are closely related to tobacco experimentation in junior middle school students,which should be attached great importance in tobacco control among junior middle school students.
